doc.title: Nurse Ajax
doc.plot: All Pet's life she had dreamed of being a nurse but the closest she got was a job as a hospital cleaner. Then as a result of Government cuts the Hospital Trust announce they will be training "auxiliary" staff to take on basic nursing duties. For most this is an unwelcome change in their job description but for Pet it is the chance of a lifetime. So what if she has to break the law a little to fulfill it?
